summary: A struggling young musician and devoted fan of Ricky Nelson wants to be just like his idol and become a rock star.
cast: Brad Pitt|Richard Boes|Cheryl Costa|Michael Luciano|Calvin Levels|Nick Cave|Ralph Marrero|Wilfredo Giovanni Clark|Alison Moir|Peter McRobbie|Ron Vawter|Dennis Parlato|Tina Louise|Michael Mulheren|Wayne Maugans|Catherine Keener|Joseph Barry|John David Barone|Tom Jarmusch|Samuel L. Jackson|Evelyn Solann|Ashley Gardner|Ahmed Ben Larby|Marianne Hettinger|Arloa Reston
title: Johnny Suede
